mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sesame_order(open_id, user_id, order_no, total_price, pay_price, `favorable_price`, consignee_name, consignee_phone, consignee_province, consignee_city, consignee_area, consignee_street, consignee_detailed_address, consignee_address, commodity_json, remarks, `status`, del_flag, created_id, created_name, created_time, updated_id, updated_name) VALUES (#{sesameOrder.openId}, #{sesameOrder.userId}, #{sesameOrder.orderNo}, #{sesameOrder.totalPrice}, #{sesameOrder.payPrice}, #{sesameOrder.favorablePrice}, #{sesameOrder.consigneeName}, #{sesameOrder.consigneePhone}, #{sesameOrder.consigneeProvince}, #{sesameOrder.consigneeCity}, #{sesameOrder.consigneeArea}, #{sesameOrder.consigneeStreet}, #{sesameOrder.consigneeDetailedAddress}, #{sesameOrder.consigneeAddress}, #{sesameOrder.commodityJson}, #{sesameOrder.remarks}, #{sesameOrder.status}, #{sesameOrder.delFlag}, #{sesameOrder.createdId}, #{sesameOrder.createdName}, #{sesameOrder.createdTime}, #{sesameOrder.updatedId}, #{sesameOrder.updatedName})
